results.description: NodeMailer Configuration: Ensure your NodeMailer configuration includes the correct settings: const transporter = nodemailer.createTransport({     host: 'smtp.office365.com', // Use the correct SMTP server     port: 587, // Use the correct port (587 for TLS)     secure: false, // Set to false for TLS     auth: {         user:.
